Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively six and five lines of a continuous text, almost complete, recording the work done by the craftsman Ramery for Itnefer (a colleague).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: J.J Janssen, 'Commodity Prices in the Ramesside Period' (Leiden, 1975), p.29 (wrongly reading the second name as 'my father Nefer[hotep]', which is followed by M. Gutgesell, 'Die Datierung der Ostraka und Papyri aus Deir el-Medineh und ihre ökonomische Interpretation. Teil I: Die 20. Dynastie' [Hildesheim 1983], p. 292).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136384) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136384)
